summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing a prior 1001 prosecution case from the Northern District of Texas, which is being referenced in relation to the MCC/Epstein matter. The email includes attachments of charging instruments and a Fifth Circuit opinion affirming a conviction.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email providing attachments related to a prior 1001 prosecution case from the Northern District of Texas, referenced in the MCC/Epstein matter.

events.title: Prior 1001 Prosecution Case Referenced
events.description: A prior 1001 prosecution case from the Northern District of Texas is discussed and attached, with its conviction affirmed by the Fifth Circuit, in relation to the MCC/Epstein matter.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 16, 2019, regarding the MCC/Epstein case.
It references a prior 1001 prosecution case from the Northern District of Texas, with attached charging instruments and a Fifth Circuit opinion affirming the conviction.
The correspondence is between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates legal research or precedent being gathered in relation to the Epstein prosecution.
